properties.Name: Dig House!
properties.Description: This is where most of the archaeologists and specialists lived while on the dig. We began our day around 5am, usually grabbing a coffee and heading out to the field, where we'd stay until the early afternoon. After breaking for lunch and taking a nap, we'd start cleaning and documentating the finds.

properties.Name: K64
properties.Description: This area is the pottery workshop where the kiln was excavated.

properties.Name: Necropolis
properties.Description: The team dug in three areas of the Necropolis this summer: N23, N15, and N27. N23 and N27 are towers that were once part of the fortifications of the island, while N15 was a ramp. All of them contain cremations or burials, many of which were excavated throughout the season.
